/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of mostly white, black, and gray, fill the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
